bbq1.description: The Joyces came over on Sunday, for our very first BBQ ever. We put Amy to work flipping the tuna steaks and vegetable kebabs.
bbq1.title: Bbq 1

bbq2.description: Our backyard has been getting nicer and nicer. In addition to the BBQ grill, our landlords recently added little café tables.
bbq2.title: Bbq 2

bbq3.description: Come on! Isn't that tuna cooked already?
bbq3.title: Bbq 3

jump.description: The jumping mania is still going strong.
jump.title: Jump

nate1.description: Nate came over for the evening. Unlike last week's debacle with Evan, Felix was a gracious host. When we told Felix it was Nate's turn to play with a toy, Felix would patiently wait, his fingers twitching with the effort of self-control.
nate1.title: Nate 1

nate2.description: Nate and Felix sometimes now play TOGETHER, rather than just side-by-side. Here Felix started blowing rasperries and Nate joined in.
nate2.title: Nate 2

nate3.description: We dug out the high chair for Nate. It's been in a closet for months because Felix refused to sit in it. Of course he fell in love with it, and has taken all his meals there since Nate's visit.
nate3.title: Nate 3

nate4.description: However, real chairs allow mid-supper calisthenics.
nate4.title: Nate 4

pinball.description: Pinball at Jen and William's new apartment. Felix is doing the baby sign for "more"... is he commenting on Dean's score?
pinball.title: Pinball

sylvie-3buddies.description:
And now, a few photos taken by Sylvie.

Felix, Edan and Robert, looking cute, cute, cute.
sylvie-3buddies.title: Sylvie 3buddies

sylvie-5bubbies.description: Edan, on her horse, surrounded by her loyal servants: Anna, Felix, Evan and Robert.
sylvie-5bubbies.title: Sylvie 5bubbies

sylvie-anza1.description: Sylvie, Robert, Edan and Felix at lake Anza in Berkeley... but who is taking the photo?
sylvie-anza1.title: Sylvie Anza 1

sylvie-anza2.description: Three little piggies in nice gooey mud.
sylvie-anza2.title: Sylvie Anza 2

sylvie-bedtime.description:
Edan, Robert, Felix, Anna and Evan, sprawled out on Sylvie's bed.

Nobody knows how, but she can consistently get 5 toddlers to sleep at the same time.
sylvie-bedtime.title: Sylvie Bedtime

sylvie-door.description:
Elise, Robert, Edan, Felix and Julien. 
They all agree that it's time to go down to the garden.
sylvie-door.title: Sylvie Door

description:
Felix is revealing himself to be quite a pacifist. At a friend's BBQ there was a piñata. Unlike baby Nate, who banged the paper bird with gusto, Felix refused to partake in the beating of the piñata, and looked to be quite anguished over the whole bizarre ritual. When the bird burst, Felix dissolved into tears. We reassembled it and made it dance a happy little birdy dance, but Felix kept mournfully chanting "cassé, cassé" (broken, broken). Similarly, Felix and Dean no longer play video games together because Felix gets too stressed. He whimpers worried "uh ohs" when Dean drives the car on the sidewalk, and cries when the car goes up in flames.

For the last week or so, Felix has been calling all big trucks "pappay", and we just could not figure out why. Then, one day, he yelled his most enthusiastic pappay to date, at the sight of a big shiny fire truck. It all became clear: he had been saying "pompier" all along, which means fireman in French (a fire truck is a "camion de pompier").
title: September 21
